inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: previous positive HCV RNA tests as well as positive enzyme immunoassay for anti-HCV-antibodies

inclusion.criterion: Previous adequate therapy with alpha interferon and ribavirin without a sustained virological response
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or inability to practice adequate contraception
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant systemic or major illnesses other than liver disease
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: His medical record shows previous positive HCV RNA tests as well as positive enzyme immunoassay for anti-HCV-antibodies

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of another form of liver disease in addition to viral hepatitis
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: There is no evidence of alcoholic liver disease, bleeding from esophageal varices, hemochromatosis, autoimmune hepatitis or metabolic liver disease

exclusion.criterion: Serious autoimmune disease that might be worsened by interferon therapy
exclusion.label: not_met
not_met
exclusion.evidence: The recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV. He has a history of previous positive HCV RNA tests and enzyme immunoassay for anti-HCV-antibodies.
